decision_conditions: <div><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve;">The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plan(s) referenced:&nbsp;</span></font></div><div><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></font></div><ul><li><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve;">Drawing ref. 5763 WD 155 RevB - Basement Floor Plan General Arrangement</span></font></li><li><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Drawing ref. 5763 WD 156 RevB - Ground Floor Plan General Arrangement</span></li><li><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Drawing ref. 5763 WD 157 RevB - First Floor (Mezzanine) Plan General Arrangement</span></li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 158 RevB - Second to Ninth Floor Plan General Arrangement</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 159 RevB -Tenth to Twelfth Floor Plan General Arrangement</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 160 RevB - Roof Level Plan General Arrangement</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 201 RevC - South Elevation</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 202 RevC - East Elevation</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 203 RevC - North East Elevation</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 204 RevC - North Elevation</li><li>Drawing ref. 5763 WD 205 RevC -West Elevation</li></ul><div><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve;">All other plans remain as approved by planning permission ref. 2021/0406 Granted on 18th October 2022.&nbsp;</span></font></div>
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 2021/0406 dated 18/10/2022 to alter the hotel aspect of the scheme only allowing for an overall reduction in hotel rooms from 295 to 275 as a result of an increase in room sizes, internal reconfiguration including additional rooms at ground and basement floors, relocation of cycle and bin stores to ground floor, reduction in size of restaurant and back of house,  increased mezzanine level with additional rooms; and external alterations to the stair core to the north of the building,  fenestration alterations and alterations to roof plant enclosure.
